summary: A ragtag group of adventurers, including a former Nazi, is led by a half-maddened grizzled treasure hunter who wants a second chance to find the mythical treasure of the Amazon, after his first mission went terribly wrong.
cast: Stuart Whitman|Donald Pleasence|Bradford Dillman|Sonia Infante|John Ireland|Emilio Fernández|Pedro Armendáriz Jr.|Jorge Luke|Ann Sidney|Clark Jarrett|Hugo Stiglitz
title: El tesoro de la selva perdida
